languages.text: Даже после смерти прошлые Вольные Торговцы и их слуги хранят династию, наполняя владельца реликвии силой.
Even after death, Rogue Traders of yore and their servants continue to preserve the dynasty by imbuing the relic's bearer with power.
languages.original_text: Даже после смерти прошлые Вольные Торговцы и их слуги хранят династию, наполняя владельца реликвии силой.

traits.locale_text: Even after death, Rogue Traders of yore and their servants are preserving the dynasty as the relic's owner is filled with power.
Even after death, Rogue Traders of yore and their servants are preserving the dynasty as the relic's owner is filled with power.
Even after death, Rogue Traders of yore and their servants continue to preserve the dynasty by imbuing the relic's bearer with power.
Even after death, Rogue Traders of yore and their servants continue to preserve the dynasty by imbuing the relic's bearer with power.
Even after death, Rogue Traders of yore and their servants continue to preserve the dynasty by imbuing the relic's bearer with power.
Even after death, Rogue Traders of yore and their servants continue to preserve the dynasty by imbuing the relic's bearer with power.

languages.text: Même après leur mort, les libres-marchands d'antan et leurs serviteurs continuent à protéger la dynastie en imprégnant le détenteur de la relique de leur pouvoir.
languages.original_text: Even after death, Rogue Traders of yore and their servants continue to preserve the dynasty by imbuing the relic's bearer with power.

traits.locale_text: Même après leur mort, les libres-marchands d'antan et leurs serviteurs continuent à protéger la dynastie en imprégnant le détenteur de la relique de leur pouvoir.

languages.text: Incluso después de la muerte, los Comerciantes Independientes de antaño y sus sirvientes siguen preservando la dinastía, dotando de poder al portador de la reliquia.
languages.original_text: Even after death, Rogue Traders of yore and their servants continue to preserve the dynasty by imbuing the relic's bearer with power.

traits.locale_text: Incluso después de la muerte, los Comerciantes Independientes de antaño y sus sirvientes siguen preservando la dinastía, dotando de poder al portador de la reliquia.

languages.text: 这件遗物会赐予它的持有者力量。即便已经化为尘埃，过去的众多行商浪人与他们的仆人也依然在守护着这个王朝。
languages.original_text: Even after death, Rogue Traders of yore and their servants continue to preserve the dynasty by imbuing the relic's bearer with power.

traits.locale_text: 这件遗物会赐予它的持有者力量。即便已经化为尘埃，过去的众多行商浪人与他们的仆人也依然在守护着这个王朝。

languages.text: 死後もローグトレーダーとその召使たちは、遺物の持ち主が力を蓄えるにつれて王朝を守っている。
languages.original_text: Even after death, Rogue Traders of yore and their servants continue to preserve the dynasty by imbuing the relic's bearer with power.

traits.locale_text: 死後もローグトレーダーとその召使たちは、遺物の持ち主が力を蓄えるにつれて王朝を守っている。

languages.text: Selbst nach dem Tod bewahren die früheren Freihändler und ihre Diener die Dynastie, indem sie dem Besitzer des Reliktes Macht gewähren.
languages.original_text: Even after death, Rogue Traders of yore and their servants continue to preserve the dynasty by imbuing the relic's bearer with power.

traits.locale_text: Selbst nach dem Tod bewahren die früheren Freihändler und ihre Diener die Dynastie, indem sie dem Besitzer des Reliktes Macht gewähren.

languages.text: Geçmişin Hür Tacirleri ve onların hizmetkârları, ölümlerinin ardından bile yadigârı elinde bulunduran kişiye güç vererek hanedanlığın korunmasına katkı yapıyorlar.
languages.original_text: Even after death, Rogue Traders of yore and their servants continue to preserve the dynasty by imbuing the relic's bearer with power.
